author: markt
msg: Fix a hanging test with APR. Connections using HTTP keep-alive were not closed on Endpoint.stop() so a stop() start() sequence meant they were kept open with any data sent being ignored until the connection timed out.

author: markt
msg: Fix a hanging test with APR. Connections using HTTP keep-alive were not closed on Endpoint.stop() so a stop() start() sequence meant they were kept open with any data sent being ignored until the connection timed out.
